sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnleaderschdulde ( schdul_id , schdul_de ) VALUES ( #schdulId# , #schdulDe# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnleaderschdulde SET schdul_id = #schdulId# , schdul_de = #schdulDe# WHERE 1 = 1 AND schdul_id = #schdulId# AND schdul_de = #schdulDe#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnleaderschdulde WHERE 1 = 1 AND schdul_id = #schdulId# AND schdul_de = #schdulDe#
sqlMap.select: SELECT schdul_id , schdul_de FROM COMTNLEADERSCHDULDE WHERE schdul_id = #schdulId# AND schdul_de = #schdulDe#

SELECT A.SCHDUL_ID , A.SCHDUL_DE FROM ( SELECT SCHDUL_ID , SCHDUL_DE , ROWNUM FROM COMTNLEADERSCHDULDE WHERE 1=1
SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword#
SCHDUL_DE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY SCHDUL_ID DESC , SCHDUL_DE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNLEADERSCHDULDE WHERE 1=1
SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword#
SCHDUL_DE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
